descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=5]Description[/size][/color]

This mod replaced all female vampire and soldier in Dawnguard.

This mod replaced only face.

Hairstyle uses the ApachiiSkyHair.

Eyes and eyebrows texture are using vanilla.

If you are using a mod to replace of vanilla,it will be reflected.

[color=#cc0000][size=5]Required File[/size][/color]

DLC Dawnguard

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
 ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_6_Full
 ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_5
[color=#ff0000][size=5]
Recommended Mods[/size][/color]

Any of the Body MOD
Eyebrow MOD to replace the vanilla.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url]
Optional File
 Eye of Beauty NPC eyes texture replacer

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1909/?]RV Vampire eyes[/url]

[color=#ff0000][size=5]Installation[/size][/color]

Use NMM installer.
Or manually copy and paste the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.

[color=#ff0000][size=5]Uninstall[/size][/color]

Use NMM installer
Or just delete files from this mod.

Data/textures/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceTint/Dawnguard.esm [Delete "Dawnguard.esm" folder]
Data/meshes/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom/Dawnguard.esm [Delete "Dawnguard.esm" folder]
Delete GY_NPC_Enemy_Rep_DG.esp

[color=#ff0000][size=4]Permission[/size][/color]

[size=4]Redistribution prohibited[/size]

[color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits[/size][/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] by Apachii
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/]Enhanced Character Edit[/url] by ECE team
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/?]Better Makeup for SKSE[/url] by [b]Diethardt[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1909/?]RV Vampire eyes[/url] by [b]Pema Mendez[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by [b]Gabriel Mailhot[/b]

[color=#ff0000][size=5][color=#ffffff][size=2]I'm Japanese. I'm not good at English.[/size][/color][/size][/color]

[color=#ff0000][size=5]Log[/size][/color]

2015.04.03 - v1.0 Release.
author: Gyot
